messages.title: Your local candidate for Hampstead and Kilburn
messages.content: I meet hundreds of people every week to discuss the issues that matter to them. I have worked at the heart of our community on issues like the HS2 rail link, protecting local schools and saving our NHS.

keyPolicies.policyDescription: Labour will end rip-off letting agent fees and bring in long-term tenancies.
We will increase free childcare for three and four-year-old's to 25 hours a week.
We will increase the minimum wage to Â£8 per hour.

housing.content: Labour will end rip-off letting agent fees and bring in long-term tenancies.

leaflet.personalStatement: Politics comes down to choices - choices about our community, raising living standards, saving our public services and protecting our National Health Service from being broken up and sold off to the highest bidder. I believe that the last five years of political choices have made life harder for many of us in our NHS and creating an economy that works for the many, not just a privileged few. Vote for a fairer choice this May. Elect me to keep standing up for Hampstead and Kilburn.

politicalExperience.role: Parliamentary Candidate for Hampstead and Kilburn
